title: Care Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Clinica Sierra Vista
Interview Descriptions: interview process was easy and fast. Onboarding was also fast, drug test and physical needed and 1 week of training after getting hired. Overall easy and fast process and good company to work for.

title: BH Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Clinica Sierra Vista (Bakersfield, CA) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Interview was set up like a Panel interview , asked about time management questions, how you juggle multiple tasks and stress management questions. Took about three weeks to hear back
Interview Questions: asked about time management questions, how you juggle multiple tasks and stress management questions.

title: Assistant MOA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Clinica Sierra Vista
Interview Descriptions:
Simple questions. They want to know how you handle certain situations, what educational background is, why you want to work in the field, how do you manage stress, 
After some questions the managers started a casual conversation about unrelated to the job.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work in the medical field?

title: Mental Health Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Clinica Sierra Vista in Dec 2018
Interview Descriptions: Group interview setting, for employer to see how you interact among others. Upon application, received a call for interview within a week. After the interview, they have assessment tests for you to take. Once that information is reviewed they move forward in the hiring process.
Interview Questions: What do you bring to our company ? Skills?

title: Medical Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Clinica Sierra Vista (Bakersfield, CA) in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions: They make you take a Math test & an English test if you don’t pass it you don’t get the job. They also make you take a drug test. There was 2 interviews I had for my department.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 weeks. I interviewed at Clinica Sierra Vista in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions: It was very short and brief. Not much was asked from me and they went off my resume. There was the clinic manager plus one person from HR that interviewed me.
Interview Questions: What makes you an asset to our clinic?

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Clinica Sierra Vista (Bakersfield, CA) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: After taking a basic math, typing and spelling test, I was offered an interview the next week. I interviewed with two people. The interview took less than an hour. I was told that it would be a week or two before I heard back from them.
Interview Questions: How have you overcome negative work environment?

title: Medical Assistant/Receptionist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Clinica Sierra Vista (Fresno, CA) in Oct 2014
Interview Descriptions: I applied online on the 19th, got an email that they would like to go forward on the 20th, took the forms they needed to them in order to make an appointment for an assessment. Need DMV record and resume. Took assessment on math, grammar, bilingual exam, typing and 10 key. Passed all assessment, HR lady said she would forward information to hiring manager. The manager called me the day after and we set an interview with a total of 3 managers the following week. I applied for a Medical Assistant position, but that was taken so they asked if I wanted to interview for front office and I accepted. I ended up interviewing with two managers, very simple interview was more like a conversation.
Interview Questions: No difficult questions, just have your answers ready to go. Always ask questions, don't say you don't have any, makes you look uninterested.

title: Program Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Clinica Sierra Vista (Bakersfield, CA) in Apr 2014
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview two people, they asked situational questions. They were very friendly and promotes advancement. Great place to work and would definitely return if I lived there. The ladies that interviewed me were the ladies I worked for.

title: Nutrition Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Clinica Sierra Vista
Interview Descriptions: The application process is fairy long but can be done and submitted online. After a  month I was called in to take a test that was made up of basic math and english.
Interview Questions: The questions were pretty standard such as, "Tell me a time when you...and how did you handle it." I don't recall exact questions.
